    • Method Detail

      • registerConfigurationProvider

        public static <CFG extends AuthenticationConfiguration<CFG>> void registerConfigurationProvider(Class<CFG> configurationClass,
                                                                                org.jboss.aerogear.android.ConfigurationProvider<CFG> provider)
        This will add a new Configuration that this Manager can build Configurations for.
        Type Parameters:
        CFG - the actual Configuration type
        Parameters:
        configurationClass - the class of configuration to be registered
        provider - the instance which will provide the configuration.

      • config

        public static <CFG extends AuthenticationConfiguration<CFG>> CFG config(String name,
                                                        Class<CFG> authenticationConfigurationClass)
        Begins a new fluent configuration stanza.
        Type Parameters:
        CFG - the Configuration type.
        Parameters:
        name - an identifier which will be used to fetch the AuthenticationModule after configuration is finished.
        authenticationConfigurationClass - the class of the configuration type.
        Returns:
        a AuthenticationConfiguration which can be used to build a AuthenticationModule object.

      • getModule

        public static AuthenticationModule getModule(String name)
        Fetches a named module
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the AuthenticationModule given in config(java.lang.String, java.lang.Class)
        Returns:
        the named AuthenticationModule or null
